strong.span:
CLOSED THROUGH FRIDAY, MAY 1ST
Latest Announcements

div.p: 28 W Jackson Street, Millersburg, OH 44654

28 W Jackson St, Millersburg, OH 44654
Fax: (330) 674-2242
Office: 8:00 am - 4:00 pm

Welcome to West Holmes Local Schools where kids are our passion, focus and priority. The community and the school have a common focus to develop our kids not only academically, but also socially and emotionally. We have so many supportive partners, allowing us to offer a variety of growth opportunities, leading to well adjusted, knowledgeable and motivated students who will become positive adult leaders.

In a societal climate, where testing and meeting state mandates has forced schools to change, we have found a way to meet those goals and still focus on "old school" traditional values. Our kids receive plenty of positive attention but we also still appreciate the need for discipline and guidance. From the time our students step on the bus in the morning and throughout the day, we want our staff to help each student grow in some positive way.

Bill Sterling
Superintendent, West Holmes Schools
